Posts.EditableText:
'This game is unlisted. Only those with the link can see it.' 
How can I delete this game?
Posts.HTML:
'This game is unlisted. Only those with the link can see it.'
How can I delete this game?

Posts.EditableText:
There’s no need to.  Just don’t share the link.

Also, if you’re working on this, and want to publish it when done, there is an option to generate a new game ID (assuming you are using offline/desktop version).
Posts.HTML:
There’s no need to. Just don’t share the link.

Also, if you’re working on this, and want to publish it when done, there is an option to generate a new game ID (assuming you are using offline/desktop version).
